body:
Comment 3 by **vbatts**: 
Previous versions did this. So, despite the relocation of the godoc command, it is a
regression. It is convenient, and follows the workflow laid out, like go list as I
mentioned. I would be curious to hear why you think it is not wanted.

I just tested go.go1.linux-amd64.tar.gz and go1.1.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz
they both will render all the docs for a package name with an ellipsis (i.e.
'crypto/...')
